message: Hello. I am mathematician from France, and since a long time I found logical structures of how to rebuild political structures based on freedom and a decentralized online social network. In particular I already thought about the main ideas of liquid democracy more than 10 years ago, but as a way to manage kinds of power other than vote so as to be directly effective independently of any official recognition by an enforcement institution. An example of such power is crowdfunding, but there are others: kinds of powers that may not address all issues but still many of them. Especially, a flexible and decentralized justice system whose decisions are logically automatically effective on a decentralized online money system. More recently I also defined a solution for an online voting system not only anonymous for organizers but also verifiable by all, and not so complicated.
